author: _shemnon
content: For EIP-7069 (EXT*CALL) when an EXTDELEGATECALL calls legacy code, should we fail?  It looks like a detail dropped from the mega-spec (https://gist.github.com/shemnon/7d94fbb4b78d6581385acf63326db937#file-eof_calls-evmone-jsonl-L194) - Also, it doesn't cause the calling frame to abort, just return a failure status ("Fail lightly", 1?)
